body.p:
West Liberty Ky
10th May 1862
To the Governor of Kentucky

Dr Sir at the June Term of the morgan Circuit Court William Walsh was fined fifty Dollars for giving to my black boy Jake a dram of whsky I on the behalf of the said Walsh ask your Excellency to remit said fine Walsh had lived in my family for several years & had worked with my slaves & he thought no harm & in fact thought it his duty to give the boy a dram as he had done often while with me I hope you will remit said fine as I did not care for his giving the boy a dram

yrs very Respectfully
Jno. W Hazelrigg

Morgan Cir Ct
$50 } liquor to a slave
Wm Walsh
Iss May 16. 1862
